## ğŸ§¹ Database Cleanup

### ğŸ“‹ ĞĞ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ
ĞĞ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ°Ñ Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ° ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ€ĞµĞ²ÑˆĞ¸Ñ… Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ±Ğ°Ğ·Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ….

**Ğ¤ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ¸:**
- ĞĞ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ° Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ (ĞµĞ¶ĞµĞ´Ğ½ĞµĞ²Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ² 3:00)
- API Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞº
- API Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞº

---

### âš™ï¸ ĞĞ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ĞºĞ° CONFIG

| ĞŸĞ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ñ€ | ĞĞ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ |
|----------|----------|
| `api_key` | API ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ°ÑƒÑ‚ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ„Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ |
| `rate_limit_window_ms` | ĞĞºĞ½Ğ¾ rate limiting (Ğ¼Ñ) |
| `rate_limit_max_requests` | ĞœĞ°ĞºÑ. Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ² Ğ² Ğ¾ĞºĞ½Ğµ |
| `table_webchat_monitoring` | Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ° |
| `table_dialog_analysis` | Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ° |
| `table_chat_histories_ru` | Ğ˜ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ° RU |
| `table_chat_histories_en` | Ğ˜ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ° EN |
| `table_user_contact_data` | ĞšĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ |
| `table_cleanup_settings` | ĞĞ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ¸ |
| `table_cleanup_logs` | Ğ›Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ¸ |

---

### ğŸ“¥ API Ğ­Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ñ‹

**ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ĞºĞ¸:**
```
GET /webhook/cleanup-settings?apiKey=YOUR_KEY
```

**ĞĞ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ĞºĞ¸:**
```json
POST /webhook/update-cleanup-settings?apiKey=YOUR_KEY
{
  "monitoringRetention": 30,
  "analysisRetention": 90,
  "dialogsRetention": 60,
  "contactsRetention": 180
}
```

parameters.query:
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
-- ğŸ“Š ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´ Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

WITH settings AS (
    SELECT * FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_cleanup_settings }} LIMIT 1
),
sessions_to_delete_ru AS (
    SELECT session_id FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_chat_histories_ru }}
    GROUP BY session_id HAVING MAX(created_at) < NOW() - ((SELECT COALESCE(dialogs_retention_days, 60) FROM settings) || ' days')::INTERVAL
),
sessions_to_delete_en AS (
    SELECT session_id FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_chat_histories_en }}
    GROUP BY session_id HAVING MAX(created_at) < NOW() - ((SELECT COALESCE(dialogs_retention_days, 60) FROM settings) || ' days')::INTERVAL
),
monitoring_sessions_to_delete AS (
    SELECT session_id FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_webchat_monitoring }}
    GROUP BY session_id HAVING MAX(last_activity_time) < NOW() - ((SELECT COALESCE(monitoring_retention_days, 30) FROM settings) || ' days')::INTERVAL
)
SELECT 'webchat_monitoring' as table_name,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_webchat_monitoring }}) as total_records,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM monitoring_sessions_to_delete) as records_to_delete
UNION ALL
SELECT 'dialog_analysis' as table_name,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_dialog_analysis }}) as total_records,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_dialog_analysis }} WHERE created_at < NOW() - ((SELECT COALESCE(analysis_retention_days, 90) FROM settings) || ' days')::INTERVAL) as records_to_delete
UNION ALL
SELECT 'n8n_chat_histories_ru' as table_name,
    (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_chat_histories_ru }}) as total_records,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions_to_delete_ru) as records_to_delete
UNION ALL
SELECT 'n8n_chat_histories_en' as table_name,
    (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_chat_histories_en }}) as total_records,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions_to_delete_en) as records_to_delete
UNION ALL
SELECT 'user_contact_data' as table_name,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_user_contact_data }}) as total_records,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_user_contact_data }} WHERE last_updated < NOW() - ((SELECT COALESCE(contacts_retention_days, 180) FROM settings) || ' days')::INTERVAL) as records_to_delete;

-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
-- ğŸ’¾ Ğ¡Ğ¾Ñ…Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ¸
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

INSERT INTO {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Cleanup').first().json.table_cleanup_logs }} (status, cleanup_date)
VALUES ('completed', NOW())
RETURNING *;

-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
-- ğŸ’¾ ĞĞ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞº Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ¸
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

UPDATE {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG: Update Settings').first().json.table_cleanup_settings }}
SET monitoring_retention_days = {{ $json.monitoring_retention_days }},
    analysis_retention_days = {{ $json.analysis_retention_days }},
    dialogs_retention_days = {{ $json.dialogs_retention_days }},
    contacts_retention_days = {{ $json.contacts_retention_days }},
    updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = 1
RETURNING *;
